sentences.sentence: That is one of the unsayable truths of our time.
sentences.translation: 这就是我们这个时代说不出口的事实。

sentences.sentence: Something in the nature of their sacrifice was unsayable.
sentences.translation: 他们的牺牲在本质上有某些不可言说的东西。

sentences.sentence: Now a controversial prize announced on October 18th seeks to make the unsayable doable.
sentences.translation: 但十月十八日宣布的一个备受争议的奖项正致力于让这个不可言说的选择具有可行性。
